alert.note: Alert for Lancaster (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 4:33PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL LANCASTER COUNTY THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lancaster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Millersville, Willow Street, New Holland, Leola, Paradise, Strasburg, Gap, Leacock, Bareville, Lampeter, Intercourse, Conestoga, Christiana, Blue Ball, Georgetown, Gordonville, Goodville, Bird-In-Hand and Smoketown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
